data.title: Duke Sports Sciences Institute
data.meta_description: Our sports medicine facility offers the full range of sports-related services for athletes at every level.
data.text:
Nobody wants to be sidelined by injury, whether you are an active adult trying to stay fit or play a professional sport. At the James R. Urbaniak Duke Sports Science Institute in Durham, and at our orthopaedic locations throughout the Triangle, our mission is to help you improve your game or return to it quickly. No matter what your performance goal is, we are here to help you achieve it.

As nationally recognized leaders in sports medicine, we offer the full spectrum of orthopaedic care. At the same time, our leaders educate future generations of sports medicine physicians, while our researchers work behind the scenes to improve injury prevention, concussion protocols, surgery recovery, physical rehab, and more.

Our sports performance professionals use our expertise and experience to design effective personalized training programs that help you achieve your goals - whether you are a professional athlete or a weekend warrior. To schedule a sports performance appointment, call 919-668-1400 and select option 8.

The James R. Urbaniak Sports Sciences Institute is located on the Center for Living campus, which is home to a variety of health and wellness programs and clinics. Our doctors, physical therapists, dietitians, and other health care professionals provide complete care, from injury evaluation and treatment to injury prevention and performance improvement -- all in one place. You'll have access to experts in primary care sports medicine, orthopedic surgery, physical therapy, sports ophthalmology, sports cardiology, women's sports medicine, concussion treatment, and more.

The Sports Sciences Institute is a modern facility that includes:

Free and convenient parking

An outdoor track

An indoor walking area

A human performance clinic and research lab (the K-Lab)

Separate areas for X-rays, casting, and orthotic fittings
